movies.title: Zero ûman R: Keishichou 0-ka no onna yokubou no daishou
movies.plot: A mysterious female spy is recruited to infiltrate the Japanese underworld and gather evidence for a clandestine secretive branch of the Tokyo Police Department. Division Zero has been charged with bringing some of Japan's most powerful criminals to justice. Rei is the only female member on the force, and she'll do whatever it takes to get her man.
movies.simplePlot: A mysterious female spy is recruited to infiltrate the Japanese underworld and gather evidence for a clandestine secretive branch of the Tokyo Police Department. Division Zero has been ...

biography.bio: Sasa Handa was born on April 18, 1985 in Okinawa, Japan. She is an actress, known for Undead Pool (2007), Tôkyô Daigaku monogatari (2006) and Zero ûman R: Keishichou 0-ka no onna yokubou no daishou (2007).
biography.name: Sasa Handa

biography.bio: Hiromitsu Kiba is an actor, known for Undead Pool (2007), Zero ûman R: Keishichou 0-ka no onna yokubou no daishou (2007) and TheEARS (2007).
biography.name: Hiromitsu Kiba

biography.bio: Atsuko Miura is an actress, known for Strange Circus (2005), Sukeban Boy (2006) and Dark Love: Rape (2008).
biography.name: Atsuko Miura

biography.bio: Masaki Miura was born on November 16, 1975 in Wakayama, Japan. He is an actor, known for Outrage (2010), Linda Linda Linda (2005) and Sketches of Kaitan City (2010). He has been married to Ai Sasamine since January 11, 2012. They have one child.
biography.name: Masaki Miura
